headline: Globe Life Q4 Earnings Surpass Estimates on Higher Premium
summary: GL's Q4 results reflect a rise in premium at both the life and health segments, improved net sales and higher investment income, offset by higher expenses.

headline: Compared to Estimates, Globe Life (GL) Q4 Earnings: A Look at Key Metrics
summary: While the top- and bottom-line numbers for Globe Life (GL) give a sense of how the business performed in the quarter ended December 2024, it could be worth looking at how some of its key metrics compare to Wall Street estimates and year-ago values.
